title: Custodian Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Franklin & Marshall College
Interview Descriptions: Straightforward. Typical process, nothing too crazy. Met for two separate interviews and they asked primarily behaviorial questions. If anything, it was just to get a sense of me as a person
Interview Questions: Tell me one thing about yourself.

title: Student Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Franklin & Marshall College (Indianapolis, IN) in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions: Interviewers were professional and well organized. They were low energy which made things a bit difficult when you're excited about the job and trying to show it. They were nice enough but came off cold which can be intimidating.
Interview Questions: What do you feel like college students struggle with the most?

title: Accountant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Franklin & Marshall College
Interview Descriptions:
Began Interview Process by submitting Application
Followed by One Phone Screen Interview call with hiring manager
And then One In-Person Interview on Campus with hiring manager and team of two additional office associates.
Interview Questions: Process oriented, experience oriented interview questions

title: Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Franklin & Marshall College in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: I spoke with a professor who I knew needed a TA, and they took me on. Very easy, just ask them. Some will reach out without a prompt. You'll need an A in the class to have a shot, and you should be generally approachable and pleasant during labs as a student with that professor if you want to be their TA later on.
Interview Questions: Are you going to be able to stay in a good mood through the whole lab so you're approachable?

title: Spanish Teacher Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Franklin & Marshall College (Lancaster, PA) in Jan 2018
Interview Descriptions: The interview was arranged to be conducted on Skype. The search committee consisted of three professors, who were friendly and interested in your candidacy for the position. You will get  a chance at the end to ask your own questions.
Interview Questions: How would you promote the program?

title: Staff Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2+ months. I interviewed at Franklin & Marshall College in Dec 2017
Interview Descriptions: I applied online, and  shortly thereafter was contacted for a phone interview. I then had an initial interview on campus and then was contacted four weeks later for a follow up interview.  During that 2nd interview, I was informed a decision would be made the following week and that I would be contacted. It took five weeks and several promptings on my part before I heard back saying the position had been filled. While I genuinely enjoyed the interviews themselves, the communication aspect is lacking.
Interview Questions: Q: Where do you see yourself in 5-10 years?

title: Admission Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Franklin & Marshall College (Lancaster, PA) in Nov 2016
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was fairly standard, brought in my resume and the interviewer conducted the conversation based off of that. They will schedule interviews with any potential students, and they last about a half hour.
Interview Questions: What are your main interests and hobbies

title: Assistant Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Franklin & Marshall College (Lancaster, PA) in Nov 2015
Interview Descriptions: I applied online. Soon after, I received an email scheduling a phone interview. The phone interview was only 30 minutes. It was very positive, but I received an auto-generated rejection letter several weeks later.
Interview Questions: What is it about F&M that you find attractive?

title: Web Development - Student Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Franklin & Marshall College (Lancaster, PA) in Aug 2013
Interview Descriptions: Minimal technical questions, but a very straightforward interview. Strengths and weaknesses.
Interview Questions: What can you add to the already existing system?

title: Trades Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Franklin & Marshall College (Lancaster, PA) in May 2013
Interview Descriptions: Very basic. Talked to two of the higher ups. They asked me a few questions about my work experience and why I thought I would be a good fit. Knowing someone is important to getting the job, so they didn't really ask me much. It was very easy and laid back.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Telephone Surveyor Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Franklin & Marshall College (Lancaster, PA) in Aug 2008
Interview Descriptions: Answered ad in newspaper. Had 1 interview and was hired on the spot.
